name: MechOS Virtua Truce Versus +
description:
PERFORMANCE ISSUES? PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION!

MechOS: Virtua Truce VS Plus (mOS:VTV+) is a Mecha Arena Fighter inspired by Virtual On: Cyber Troopers, Armored Core, some Metal Gear and all around dosage of ROBOTS FIGHTING FOR JUSTICE. Are the robots piloted by people or fully autonomous? Who knows? That’s up for us to decide and you to find out!

Play robot melee footsies where they’re slashing and dodging and stabbing and jabbing, or boosting around like mad to dodge some bullets. You may even thwart a government plot along the way.


-Some (most) of these texts are ripped straight from the design doc
